   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          range_archive_request/1,
   37:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   38:          limit_archive_request/1,
   39:          prefs_set_request/1,
   40:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   41:          pagination_first5/1,
   42:          pagination_last5/1,
   43:          pagination_before10/1,
   44:          pagination_after10/1,
   45:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   47:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   48:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   49:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   50:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   51:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          archived/1,
   56:          strip_archived/1,
   57:          filter_forwarded/1,
   58:          policy_violation/1,
   59:          offline_message/1,
   60:          purge_single_message/1,
   61:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   62:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   63:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   64:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   65:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   66:          iq_spoofing/1]).
   67: 
   68: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   69: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   70: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   71: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   72: 
   73: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   74:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   75:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   76:     )).
   77: 
   78: -record(rsm_in, {
   79:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   80:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   81:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   82:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   83:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   84:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   85:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   86:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   87:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   88:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   89:         }).
   90: 
   91: -record(forwarded_message, {
   92:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
   93:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
   94:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
   95:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
   96:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
   97:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
   98:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
   99:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  100:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  101: }).
  102: 
  103: -record(result_iq, {
  104:     from            :: binary(),
  105:     to              :: binary(),
  106:     id              :: binary(),
  107:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  108:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  109:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  110:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  111: }).
  112: 
  113: -record(error_iq, {
  114:     id              :: binary(),
  115:     type            :: binary(),
  116:     error_type      :: binary(),
  117:     condition       :: binary(),
  118:     text            :: binary()
  119: }).
  120: 
  121: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  122:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  123:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  124:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  125: }).
  126: 
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: %% Suite configuration
  129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  130: 
  131: muc_host() ->
  132:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  133: 
  134: host() ->
  135:     <<"localhost">>.
  136: 
  137: configurations() ->
  138:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  139:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  140: 
  141: odbc_configs(true) ->
  142:     [odbc,
  143:      odbc_async_pool,
  144:      odbc_mnesia,
  145:      odbc_async_cache,
  146:      odbc_cache,
  147:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  148:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  149: odbc_configs(_) ->
  150:     [].
  151: 
  152: riak_configs(true) ->
  153:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  154: riak_configs(_) ->
  155:      [].
  156: 
  157: basic_group_names() ->
  158:     [
  159:     mam,
  160:     mam_purge,
  161:     muc,
  162:     muc_with_pm,
  163:     rsm,
  164:     with_rsm,
  165:     muc_rsm,
  166:     bootstrapped,
  167:     archived,
  168:     policy_violation,
  169:     offline_message
  170:     ].
  171: 
  172: all() ->
  173:     Reasons =
  174:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  175:         false -> [require_odbc];
  176:         true  -> []
  177:     end,
  178:     case Reasons of
  179:         [] ->
  180:             tests();
  181:         [_|_] ->
  182:             {skip, Reasons}
  183:     end.
  184: 
  185: tests() ->
  186:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  187:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  188:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  189: 
  190: groups() ->
  191:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  192:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  193:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  194: 
  195: is_skipped(riak_timed_yz_buckets, G) ->
  196:     lists:member(G, [muc, muc_with_pm, muc_rsm]);
  197: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  198:     false.
  199: 
  200: 
  201: basic_groups() ->
  202:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  203:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  204:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  205:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  206:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  207:      {offline_message,  [], offline_message_cases()},
  208:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  209:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  210:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  211:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  212:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()}].
  213: 
  214: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  215:      [purge_old_single_message,
  216:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  217: 
  218: mam_cases() ->
  219:     [mam_service_discovery,
  220:      simple_archive_request,
  221:      range_archive_request,
  222:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  223:      limit_archive_request,
  224:      prefs_set_request,
  225:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  226:      iq_spoofing
  227:      ].
  228: 
  229: mam_purge_cases() ->
  230:     [purge_single_message,
  231:      purge_multiple_messages].
  232: 
  233: archived_cases() ->
  234:     [archived,
  235:      strip_archived,
  236:      filter_forwarded].
  237: 
  238: policy_violation_cases() ->
  239:     [policy_violation].
  240: 
  241: offline_message_cases() ->
  242:     [offline_message].
  243: 
  244: muc_cases() ->
  245:     [muc_service_discovery,
  246:      muc_archive_request,
  247:      muc_archive_purge,
  248:      muc_multiple_devices,
  249:      muc_private_message,
  250:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  251:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  252:      ].
  253: 
  254: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  255:     rsm_cases().
  256: 
  257: with_rsm_cases() ->
  258:     rsm_cases().
  259: 
  260: rsm_cases() ->
  261:       [pagination_first5,
  262:        pagination_last5,
  263:        pagination_before10,
  264:        pagination_after10,
  265:        pagination_empty_rset,
  266:        %% Border cases
  267:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  268:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  269:        %% Simple cases
  270:        pagination_simple_before10,
  271:        %% opt_count cases
  272:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  273:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  274:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  275:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  276:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  277:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  278:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  279: 
  280: suite() ->
  281:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
  282: 
  283: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  284:     [{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  285:      | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
  286: 
  287: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  288:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  289: 
  290: user_names() ->
  291:     [alice, bob].
  292: 
  293: create_users(Config) ->
  294:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  295: 
  296: delete_users(Config) ->
  297:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  298: 
  299: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  300:    C = configuration(Group),
  301:    B = basic_group(Group),
  302:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  303:         skip ->
  304:             {skip, {init_modules, C, B, ConfigIn}};
  305:         Config0 ->
  306:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  307:                    [Group, C, B]),
  308:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  309:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  310:     end.
  311: 
  312: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  313:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  314:     case C of
  315:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  316:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  317:         _ ->
  318:             Config0
  319:     end.
  320: 
  321: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  322:     delete_users(Config),
  323:     C = configuration(Group),
  324:     B = basic_group(Group),
  325:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  326: 
  327: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  328:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  329: 
  330: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  331:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  332:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  333:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  334:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  335:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  336:     Config;
  337: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  338:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  339:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  340:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  341:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  342:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  343:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  344:     Config;
  345: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  346:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  347:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  348:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  349:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  350:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  351:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  352:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  353:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  354:     Config;
  355: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  356:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  357:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  358:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  359:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  360:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  361:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  362:     Config;
  363: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  364:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  365:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  366:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  367:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  368:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  369:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  370:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  371:     Config;
  372: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  373:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  374:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  375:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  376:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  377:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  378:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  379:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  380:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  381:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  382:     Config;
  383: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  384:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  385:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  386:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  387:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  388:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  389:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  390:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  391:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  392:     Config;
  393: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  394:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  395:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  396:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  397:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  398:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  399:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  400:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  401:     Config;
  402: 
  403: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  404:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  405:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  406:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  407:     Config;
  408: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  409:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  412:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  413:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  414:     Config;
  415: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  420:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  421:     Config;
  422: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  427:     Config;
  428: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  434:     Config;
  435: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  438:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  442:     Config;
  443: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  449:     Config;
  450: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  456:     Config;
  457: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  462:     Config;
  463: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  465:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  466:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  468:     Config;
  469: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  475:     Config;
  476: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm]),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  479:     Config;
  480: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  486:     Config;
  487: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  492:     Config;
  493: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  497:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  499:     Config;
  500: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  503:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  506:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  507:     Config;
  508: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  509:     skip;
  510: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  516:     Config.
  517: 
  518: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  519:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  520:     Config.
  521: 
  522: mam_modules() ->
  523:     [mod_mam,
  524:      mod_mam_muc,
  525:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  526:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  527:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  528:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  529:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  530:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  531:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  532:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  533:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  534:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  535:      mod_mam_mnesia_dirty_prefs,
  536:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  537:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  538:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  539:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  540: 
  541: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  542:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  543:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  544:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  545:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  546: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  547:     Config;
  548: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  549:     Config;
  550: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  551:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  552: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  553:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  554:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  555: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  556:     clean_archives(Config).
  557: 
  558: 
  559: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  560:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  561:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  562:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  563:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  564:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  565:                                        ],
  566:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  567:                  _ ->
  568:                      ConfigIn
  569:              end,
  570:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  571: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  572:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  573: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  574:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  575: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  576:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  577: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  578:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  579: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  580:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  581:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  582: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  583:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  584:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  585: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  586:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  587:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  588: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  589:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  590:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  591: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  592:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  593:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  594: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  595:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  596: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  597:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  598: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  599:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  600: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  601:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  602: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  603:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  604:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  605: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  606:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  607: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  608:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  609: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  610:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  611: 
  612: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  613:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  614:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  615:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  616:         _ ->
  617:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  618:     end.
  619: 
  620: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  621:     destroy_room(Config),
  622:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  623: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  624:     destroy_room(Config),
  625:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  626: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  627:     destroy_room(Config),
  628:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  629: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  630:     destroy_room(Config),
  631:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  632: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  633:     destroy_room(Config),
  634:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  635: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  636:     destroy_room(Config),
  637:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  638: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  639:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  640: 
  641: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  642:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  643:     orelse
  644:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  645:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  646:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  647: 
  648: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  649:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  650: 
  651: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  652:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  653: 
  654: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  655:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  656:         non_existing -> ok;
  657:         false        -> ok;
  658:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  659:     end.
  660: 
  661: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  662:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  663:     ok.
  664: 
  665: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  666:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  667:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  668:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  669:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  670:     Result ->
  671:         Result
  672:     end.
  673: 
  674: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  675:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  676:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  677:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  678: 
  679: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  680: %% Group name helpers
  681: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  682: 
  683: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  684:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  685: 
  686: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  687: configuration(Group) ->
  688:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  689: 
  690: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  691: %% will be tested.
  692: %%
  693: %% Example:
  694: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  695: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  696: %% @end
  697: make_greedy(List) ->
  698:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  699: 
  700: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  701: basic_group(Group) ->
  702:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  703: 
  704: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  705:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  706:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  707:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  708: 
  709: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  710:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  711: 
  712: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  713:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  714:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  715:         true -> PrefixA;
  716:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  717:     end.
  718: 
  719: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  720:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  721: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  722:     Target.
  723: 
  724: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  725:     Tail.
  726: 
  727: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  728: %% Adhoc tests
  729: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  730: 
  731: %% Querying the archive for messages
  732: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  733:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  734:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  735:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  736:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  737:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  738:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  739:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  740:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  741:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  742:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  743:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  744:         assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  745:         ok
  746:         end,
  747:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  748:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  749:                       ],
  750:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  751:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  752: 
  753: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  754:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  755:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  756:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  757: 
  758:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  759: 
  760:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  761:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID)),
  762:         assert_respond_size(CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  763:         ok
  764:         end,
  765:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  766: 
  767: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  768:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  769:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  770:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  771: 
  772:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  773: 
  774:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(<<>>),
  775:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  776:         assert_respond_size(MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  777: 
  778:         ok
  779:         end,
  780:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  781: 
  782: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  783:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  784:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  785:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  786: 
  787:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  788:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  789:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  790: 
  791:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID),
  792:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  793:         Result = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
  794: 
  795:         assert_respond_size(Len, Result),
  796:         ok
  797:         end,
  798:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  799: 
  800: archived(Config) ->
  801:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  802:         %% Archive must be empty.
  803:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  804:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  805: 
  806:         %% Bob receives a message.
  807:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  808:         try
  809:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  810:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  811:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  812:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  813:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  814: 
  815:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  816: 
  817:         %% Bob calls archive.
  818:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  819:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  820:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  821:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  822:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  823:         ok
  824:         catch Class:Reason ->
  825:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  826:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  827:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  828:         end
  829:         end,
  830:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  831: 
  832: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  833:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  834:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  835:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  836: 
  837:         %% Bob receives a message.
  838:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  839:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  840:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  841:         [_ArcIQ1, _ArcMsg1] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  842: 
  843:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  844:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  845:         [_ArcIQ2, _ArcMsg2] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  846:         ok
  847:         end,
  848:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  849: 
  850: strip_archived(Config) ->
  851:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  852:         %% Archive must be empty.
  853:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  854:         escalus:send(Alice,
  855:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
  856:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  857:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
  858: 
  859:         %% Bob receives a message.
  860:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  861:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  862:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  863:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  864:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  865:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  866: 
  867:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
  868: 
  869:         try
  870:         %% Bob calls archive.
  871:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  872:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  873:         [_ArcIQ, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
  874:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  875:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
  876:         ok
  877:         catch Class:Reason ->
  878:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  879:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  880:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  881:         end
  882:         end,
  883:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  884: 
  885: wait_archive_respond_iq_first(User) ->
  886:     %% rot1
  887:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond(User)),
  888:     [IQ|lists:reverse(Messages)].
  889: 
  890: wait_archive_respond(User) ->
  891:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
  892:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
  893:         true ->
  894:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
  895:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
  896:         false -> ok
  897:     end,
  898:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
  899:         true  -> [S];
  900:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond(User)]
  901:     end.
  902: 
  903: assert_respond_size(Size, Respond) when length(Respond) =:= (Size + 1) ->
  904:     Respond;
  905: assert_respond_size(ExpectedSize, Respond) ->
  906:     RespondSize = length(Respond) - 1,
  907:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
  908:     %% void()
  909: 
  910: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
  911: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
  912: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
  913: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
  914: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
  915: policy_violation(Config) ->
  916:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  917:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
  918:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
  919:         [escalus:send(Alice,
  920:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
  921:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
  922:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
  923:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
  924:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  925:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
  926:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"will_fail">>)),
  927:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
  928:         try
  929:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
  930:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
  931:             ok
  932:         catch Class:Reason ->
  933:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  934:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
  935:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  936:         end
  937:         end,
  938:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  939: 
  940: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
  941: offline_message(Config) ->
  942:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
  943:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  944:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
  945:         escalus:send(Alice,
  946:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
  947:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  948:         ok
  949:         end,
  950:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
  951: 
  952:     %% Bob logs in
  953:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
  954: 
  955:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
  956:     %% will be delivered automatically.
  957: 
  958:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
  959:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
  960: 
  961:     %% Bob checks his archive.
  962:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  963:     [_ArcRes | ArcMsgs] = R = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob),
  964:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
  965: 
  966:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
  967: 
  968: purge_single_message(Config) ->
  969:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  970:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  971:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  972:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  973:             [_IQ, Mess] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  974:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
  975:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
  976:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
  977:             %% Waiting for ack.
  978:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
  979:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
  980:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  981:             ok
  982:         end,
  983:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  984: 
  985: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
  986:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  987:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>)),
  988:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  989:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
  990:             [_IQ|AllMessages] = assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize,
  991:                 wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
  992:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
  993:             %% Delete fifth message.
  994:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
  995:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
  996:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
  997:             %% Waiting for ack.
  998:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
  999:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1000:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1001:             assert_respond_size(AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 1002:             ok
 1003:         end,
 1004:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1005: 
 1006: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1007:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1008:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1009:             [begin
 1010:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1011:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N))),
 1012:                  timer:sleep(100)
 1013:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1014:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1015:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1016:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1017:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1018:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1019:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1020:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1021:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1022:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(<<"q2">>)),
 1023:             assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1024:             ok
 1025:         end,
 1026:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1027: 
 1028: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1029:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1030:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1031:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1032:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1033:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1034:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1035: 
 1036:         %% Bob received presences.
 1037:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1038: 
 1039:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1040:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1041: 
 1042:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1043: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1044: 
 1045:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1046:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1047:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1048:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1049:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1050:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1051:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1052:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1053:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1054:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1055: 
 1056: 
 1057:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1058:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1059:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1060:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1061:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1062:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1063:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1064:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1065:         ok
 1066:         end,
 1067:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1068: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1069: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1070:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1071:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1072:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1073:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1074:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1075:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1076: 
 1077:         %% Bob received presences.
 1078:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1079: 
 1080:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1081:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1082: 
 1083:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1084:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1085: 
 1086:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1087:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1088:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1089:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1090:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1091:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1092:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1093:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1094:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1095:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1096:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1097:         ok
 1098:     end,
 1099:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1100: 
 1101: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1102:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1103:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1104:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1105:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1106:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1107:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1108:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1109:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1110: 
 1111:         %% Alice received presences.
 1112:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1113:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1114: 
 1115:         %% Bob received presences.
 1116:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1117: 
 1118:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1119:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1120: 
 1121:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1122:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1123:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1124: 
 1125:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1126: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1127: 
 1128:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1129:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1130:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1131: 
 1132:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1133:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1134: 
 1135:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1136:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1137:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1138: 
 1139:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1140:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1141:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1142:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1143:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1144:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1145:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1146:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1147:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1148:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1149: 
 1150:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1151: 
 1152:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1153:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1154:         [_ArcRes, ArcMsg] = assert_respond_size(1, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1155:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1156:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1157:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1158:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1159:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1160:         ok
 1161:         end,
 1162:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1163: 
 1164: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1165:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1166:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1167:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1168:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1169:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1170: 
 1171:         %% Bob received presences.
 1172:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1173: 
 1174:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1175:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1176: 
 1177:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1178:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1179:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1180:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1181: 
 1182:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1183:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1184:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1185: 
 1186:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1187:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1188:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1189:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1190:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1191:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1192: 
 1193:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1194:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"q1">>), Room)),
 1195:         [_ArcRes] = assert_respond_size(0, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Bob)),
 1196:         ok
 1197:         end,
 1198:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1199: 
 1200: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1201: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1202:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1203:         %% Send
 1204:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1205:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1206:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1207:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1208:         %%   </query>
 1209:         %% </iq>
 1210:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request()),
 1211:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1212:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1213:         ok
 1214:         end,
 1215:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1216: 
 1217: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1218:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1219:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1220:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1221:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1222:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1223:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1224:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1225:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1226:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1227:         %% Send
 1228:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1229:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1230:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1231:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1232:         %%   </query>
 1233:         %% </iq>
 1234:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(StartTime, StopTime)),
 1235:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1236:         M1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1237:         M2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1238:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1239:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1240:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1241:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1242:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1243:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1244:         ok
 1245:         end,
 1246:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1247: 
 1248: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1249:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1250:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1251:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1252:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1253: 
 1254: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1255: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1256: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1257:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1258:         %% Send
 1259:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1260:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1261:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1262:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1263:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1264:         %%       </set>
 1265:         %%   </query>
 1266:         %% </iq>
 1267:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request()),
 1268:         [IQ | Msgs] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 1269:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1270:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1271:         ok
 1272:         end,
 1273:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1274: 
 1275: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1276:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1277:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1278:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1279: 
 1280:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1281:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1282:         wait_empty_rset(Alice, 15)
 1283:         end,
 1284:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1285: 
 1286: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1287:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1288:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1289:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1290:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1291:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1292:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1293:         ok
 1294:         end,
 1295:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1296: 
 1297: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1298:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1299:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1300:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1301:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1302:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1303:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 5),
 1304:         ok
 1305:         end,
 1306:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1307: 
 1308: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1309:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1310:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1311:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1312:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1313:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1314:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1315:         ok
 1316:         end,
 1317:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1318: 
 1319: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1320:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1321:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1322:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1323:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1324:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1325:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1326:         ok
 1327:         end,
 1328:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1329: 
 1330: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1331:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1332:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1333:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1334:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1335:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1336:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1337:         ok
 1338:         end,
 1339:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1340: 
 1341: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1342:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1343:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1344:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1345:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1346:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1347:         wait_message_range(Alice, 1, 15),
 1348:         ok
 1349:         end,
 1350:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1351: 
 1352: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1353:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1354:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1355:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1356:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1357:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1358:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 10),
 1359:         ok
 1360:         end,
 1361:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1362: 
 1363: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1364:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1365:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1366:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1367:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1368:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1369:         wait_message_range(Alice, 6, 15),
 1370:         ok
 1371:         end,
 1372:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1373: 
 1374: 
 1375: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1376:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1377:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1378:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1379:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1380:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1381:         wait_message_range(Alice, 5, 9),
 1382:         ok
 1383:         end,
 1384:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1385: 
 1386: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1387:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1388:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1389:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1390:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1391:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1392:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1393:         wait_message_range(Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1394:         ok
 1395:         end,
 1396:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1397: 
 1398: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1399:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1400:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1401:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1402:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1403:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1404:         wait_message_range(Alice, 11, 15),
 1405:         ok
 1406:         end,
 1407:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1408: 
 1409: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1410: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1411: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1412:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1413:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1414:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1415:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1416:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1417:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1418:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1419:         wait_message_range(Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1420:         ok
 1421:         end,
 1422:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1423: 
 1424: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1425: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1426:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1427:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1428:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1429:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1430:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1431:             stanza_page_archive_request(<<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1432:      %% wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1433:         wait_message_range(Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1434:         ok
 1435:         end,
 1436:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1437: 
 1438: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1439:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1440: 
 1441: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1442:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1443:         true ->
 1444:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1445:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1446:         _ ->
 1447:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1448:     end.
 1449: 
 1450: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1451:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1452:         true ->
 1453:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1454:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1455:         _ ->
 1456:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1457:     end.
 1458: 
 1459: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1460:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1461:         %% Send
 1462:         %%
 1463:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1464:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1465:         %%     <always>
 1466:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1467:         %%     </always>
 1468:         %%     <never>
 1469:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1470:         %%     </never>
 1471:         %%   </prefs>
 1472:         %% </iq>
 1473:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1474:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1475:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1476:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1477: 
 1478:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1479:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1480: 
 1481:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1482:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1483:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1484:         ok
 1485:         end,
 1486:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1487: 
 1488: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1489: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1490: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1491: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1492: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1493:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1494:         %% Send
 1495:         %%
 1496:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1497:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1498:         %%     <always>
 1499:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1500:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1501:         %%     </always>
 1502:         %%   </prefs>
 1503:         %% </iq>
 1504:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1505:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1506:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1507:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1508:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1509: 
 1510:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1511:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1512: 
 1513:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1514:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1515:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1516:         ok
 1517:         end,
 1518:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1519: 
 1520: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1521:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1522:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1523:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1524:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1525:         try
 1526:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1527:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1528:         ok
 1529:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1530:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1531:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1532:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1533:         end
 1534:         end,
 1535:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1536: 
 1537: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1538: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1539:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1540:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1541:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1542:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1543:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1544:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1545:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1546:         ok
 1547:         end,
 1548:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1549: 
 1550: iq_spoofing(Config) ->
 1551:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1552:         %% Sending iqs between clients is allowed.
 1553:         %% Every client MUST check "from" and "id" attributes.
 1554:         %% This test checks, that server assign corrent "from" attribute
 1555:         %% when it is not specified.
 1556:         To = escalus_utils:get_jid(Alice),
 1557:         From = escalus_utils:get_jid(Bob),
 1558:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:to(result_iq(), To)),
 1559:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1560:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(From, Stanza),
 1561:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Alice),
 1562:         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Bob),
 1563:         ok
 1564:         end,
 1565:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1566: 
 1567: result_iq() ->
 1568:     #xmlel{
 1569:         name = <<"iq">>,
 1570:         attrs = [{<<"id">>,<<"xxx">>}, {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1571:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"query">>}]}.
 1572: 
 1573: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1574: %% Helpers
 1575: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1576: 
 1577: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1578: 
 1579: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1580: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1581: 
 1582: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1583:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1584:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1585:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1586:     }]).
 1587: 
 1588: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1589:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1590:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1591:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1592:        children = skip_undefined([
 1593:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1594:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1595:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1596:     }]).
 1597: 
 1598: 
 1599: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1600:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1601: 
 1602: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1603:     [];
 1604: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1605:     [{K, V}].
 1606: 
 1607: mam_ns_attr() ->
 1608:     [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}].
 1609: 
 1610: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1611:     undefined;
 1612: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1613:     #xmlel{
 1614:         name = <<"start">>,
 1615:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1616: 
 1617: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1618:     undefined;
 1619: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1620:     #xmlel{
 1621:         name = <<"end">>,
 1622:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1623: 
 1624: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1625:     undefined;
 1626: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1627:     #xmlel{
 1628:         name = <<"with">>,
 1629:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1630: 
 1631: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1632: %% a certain query.
 1633: stanza_archive_request(QueryId) ->
 1634:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId,
 1635:                               undefined, undefined,
 1636:                               undefined, undefined).
 1637: 
 1638: stanza_date_range_archive_request() ->
 1639:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1640:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1641:                               undefined, undefined).
 1642: 
 1643: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(Start, Stop) ->
 1644:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined,
 1645:                               Start, Stop,
 1646:                               undefined, undefined).
 1647: 
 1648: stanza_limit_archive_request() ->
 1649:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1650:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1651: 
 1652: stanza_page_archive_request(QueryId, RSM) ->
 1653:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1654: 
 1655: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(BWithJID) ->
 1656:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(undefined, undefined,
 1657:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1658: 
 1659: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1660:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1661:        name = <<"query">>,
 1662:        attrs = mam_ns_attr()
 1663:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 1664:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 1665:        children = skip_undefined([
 1666:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 1667:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 1668:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1669:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1670:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 1671:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1672:     }]).
 1673: 
 1674: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 1675:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 1676: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 1677:     [].
 1678: 
 1679: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 1680:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 1681: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 1682:     [].
 1683: 
 1684: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 1685:     [];
 1686: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 1687:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1688:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 1689:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 1690:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 1691:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 1692: 
 1693: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 1694:     undefined;
 1695: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 1696:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1697:            children = skip_undefined([
 1698:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 1699:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 1700:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 1701: 
 1702: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 1703: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 1704: 
 1705: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 1706:     undefined;
 1707: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 1708:     #xmlel{
 1709:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 1710:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 1711: 
 1712: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 1713:     undefined;
 1714: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 1715:     #xmlel{
 1716:         name = <<"index">>,
 1717:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 1718: 
 1719: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 1720:     undefined;
 1721: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 1722:     #xmlel{
 1723:         name = <<"max">>,
 1724:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 1725: 
 1726: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 1727:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 1728:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 1729:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 1730:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 1731: 
 1732: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 1733:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 1734:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 1735:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 1736: 
 1737: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 1738:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 1739:     A =:= Raw.
 1740: 
 1741: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1742: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 1743: 
 1744: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NewerJIDs) ->
 1745:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1746:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 1747:     NewerEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1748:                       children = encode_jids(NewerJIDs)},
 1749:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1750:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1751:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1752:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 1753:        children = [AlwaysEl, NewerEl]
 1754:     }]).
 1755: 
 1756: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 1757:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 1758:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 1759:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 1760:     }]).
 1761: 
 1762: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 1763: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 1764:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 1765: 
 1766: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 1767:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 1768: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 1769:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 1770:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 1771: 
 1772: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1773: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 1774: 
 1775: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1776:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1777:     M = #forwarded_message{
 1778:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1779:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 1780:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 1781: 
 1782: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 1783:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 1784:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 1785:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1786:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 1787:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1788:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 1789: 
 1790: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 1791:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 1792:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 1793: 
 1794: 
 1795: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 1796:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 1797:     M#forwarded_message{
 1798:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1799:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 1800: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 1801:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 1802:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 1803:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 1804:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1805:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1806:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 1807:                 M1, Children).
 1808: 
 1809: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 1810:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 1811:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 1812: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 1813: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 1814:     M.
 1815: 
 1816: %% Num is 1-based.
 1817: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 1818:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 1819:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 1820:     Id.
 1821: 
 1822: 
 1823: %% @doc Result query iq.
 1824: %%
 1825: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1826: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1827: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1828: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 1829: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1830: %%     []}]
 1831: %%
 1832: %%
 1833: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 1834: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 1835: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 1836: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 1837: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 1838: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 1839: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 1840: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 1841: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 1842: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 1843: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 1844: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 1845: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 1846: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 1847: parse_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1848:                        attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1849:     IQ = #result_iq{
 1850:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 1851:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 1852:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1853:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1854: 
 1855: 'parse_children[iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"query">>, children = Children},
 1856:                      IQ) ->
 1857:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1858: 
 1859: 
 1860: 'parse_children[iq/query]'(#xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 1861:                                   children = Children},
 1862:                            IQ) ->
 1863:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1864:
