 1865: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"first">>,
 1866:                                       attrs = Attrs,
 1867:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, First}]},
 1868:                                IQ) ->
 1869:     Index = case proplists:get_value(<<"index">>, Attrs) of
 1870:                 undefined -> undefined;
 1871:                 X -> list_to_integer(binary_to_list(X))
 1872:             end,
 1873:     IQ#result_iq{first_index = Index, first = First};
 1874: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"last">>,
 1875:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Last}]},
 1876:                                IQ) ->
 1877:     IQ#result_iq{last = Last};
 1878: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(#xmlel{name = <<"count">>,
 1879:                                       children = [{xmlcdata, Count}]},
 1880:                                IQ) ->
 1881:     IQ#result_iq{count = list_to_integer(binary_to_list(Count))};
 1882: 'parse_children[iq/query/set]'(_, IQ) -> IQ.
 1883: 
 1884: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 1885: 
 1886: 
 1887: 
 1888: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 1889:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 1890:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1891: 
 1892: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 1893:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 1894:                            IQ) ->
 1895:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 1896:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 1897:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 1898: 
 1899: 
 1900: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 1901:                                         children = Children},
 1902:                                  IQ) ->
 1903:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 1904: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 1905:                                         children = Children},
 1906:                                  IQ) ->
 1907:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 1908: 
 1909: 
 1910: parse_jids(Els) ->
 1911:     [JID || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 1912: 
 1913: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 1914: %%   <error type='modify'>
 1915: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 1916: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 1917: %%   </error>
 1918: %% </iq>
 1919: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 1920:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 1921: 
 1922:     IQ = #error_iq{
 1923:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 1924:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 1925:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 1926: 
 1927: 
 1928: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 1929:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 1930:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 1931:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 1932:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 1933: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 1934:     IQ.
 1935: 
 1936: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 1937:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 1938:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 1939: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 1940:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 1941: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 1942:     IQ.
 1943: 
 1944: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1945: %% Helpers (muc)
 1946: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1947: 
 1948: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 1949:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 1950:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 1951:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 1952:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 1953:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 1954: 
 1955: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 1956:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 1957:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 1958:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 1959:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 1960:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 1961: 
 1962: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 1963:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 1964:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 1965:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 1966:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 1967: 
 1968: destroy_room(Config) ->
 1969:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 1970:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 1971:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 1972:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 1973:         _ -> ok
 1974:     end.
 1975: 
 1976: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 1977:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 1978:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 1979:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 1980:                    Room, Nick).
 1981: 
 1982: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 1983:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 1984: 
 1985: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 1986:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 1987: 
 1988: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 1989:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 1990: 
 1991: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 1992:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 1993: 
 1994: 
 1995: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 1996:     Pid = self(),
 1997:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1998:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1999:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2000:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2001:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2002: 
 2003:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2004:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2005: 
 2006:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2007:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2008:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2009:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2010:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2011:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2012:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2013:         %% Get whole history.
 2014:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2015:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(<<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2016:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2017:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2018:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2019:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2020:         ok
 2021:         end,
 2022:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2023:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2024:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2025:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2026: 
 2027:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2028:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2029: 
 2030: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2031:     Pid = self(),
 2032:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2033:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2034:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2035:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2036:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2037:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2038:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2039:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2040:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2041:         %% Get whole history.
 2042:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(<<"all_messages">>)),
 2043:         [_ArcIQ|AllMessages] =
 2044:             assert_respond_size(15, wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice)),
 2045:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2046:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2047:         ok
 2048:         end,
 2049:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2050:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2051:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2052:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2053: 
 2054:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2055:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2056: 
 2057: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2058:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2059: 
 2060: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2061:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2062:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2063: 
 2064: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2065:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2066:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2067:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2068:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2069:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2070:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2071:     Config.
 2072: 
 2073: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2074:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2075:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2076:     timer:sleep(500),
 2077:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2078:     Config.
 2079: 
 2080: serv_users(Config) ->
 2081:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2082:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2083: 
 2084: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2085:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2086:     {Server, Username}.
 2087: 
 2088: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2089: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2090:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2091:        0 -> ok;
 2092:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2093:     end.
 2094: 
 2095: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2096: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2097:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2098:        0 -> ok;
 2099:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, X})
 2100:     end.
 2101: 
 2102: 
 2103: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2104:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2105: 
 2106: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2107:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2108: 
 2109: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2110:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2111: 
 2112: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2113:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2114: 
 2115: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2116:     %% Do not care
 2117:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2118:     ok.
 2119: 
 2120: wait_message_range(Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2121:     wait_message_range(Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2122: 
 2123: wait_message_range(Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2124:     [IQ|Messages] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Client),
 2125:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2126:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2127:     try
 2128:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2129:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2130:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2131:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2132:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2133:         ok
 2134:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2135:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2136:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2137:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2138:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2139:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2140:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2141:     end.
 2142: 
 2143: 
 2144: wait_empty_rset(Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2145:     [IQ] = wait_archive_respond_iq_first(Alice),
 2146:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(IQ),
 2147:     try
 2148:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2149:         ok
 2150:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2151:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2152:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2153:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2154:     end.
 2155: 
 2156: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2157:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2158:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2159:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2160:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2161:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2162:     end.
 2163: 
 2164: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2165:     random:seed(now()),
 2166:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2167:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2168:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2169:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2170:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2171:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2172:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2173:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2174:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2175:     timer:sleep(1500),
 2176:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2177: 
 2178: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2179:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2180:         ID1 =< ID2
 2181:     end,
 2182:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2183: 
 2184: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2185:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2186:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2187:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2188:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2189:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2190: 
 2191: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2192:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2193: 
 2194:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2195:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2196: 
 2197: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2198:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2199:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2200:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2201:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2202:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2203:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2204:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2205: 
 2206: random_time() ->
 2207:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2208:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2209:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2210: 
 2211: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2212:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2213:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2214:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2215:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2216: 
 2217: 
 2218: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2219:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2220: 
 2221: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2222:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2223:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2224:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2225:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2226:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2227:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2228: 
 2229: archive_message(Args) ->
 2230:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2231: 
 2232: 
 2233: 
 2234: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2235:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2236: 
 2237:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2238:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2239:     R = room_address(Room),
 2240: 
 2241:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2242:     Host = host(),
 2243:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2244:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2245:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2246:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2247:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2248:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2249:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2250:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2251: 
 2252:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2253: 
 2254:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2255: 
 2256: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2257:     Host = host(),
 2258:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2259: 
 2260: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2261:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2262:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2263:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2264:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2265: 
 2266: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2267: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2268:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2269:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2270: 
 2271: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2272:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2273: 
 2274: 
 2275: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2276:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2277: 
 2278: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2279:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2280:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2281:         Other ->
 2282:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2283:             false
 2284:     end.
 2285: 
 2286: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2287:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2288:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2289:             true;
 2290:         _ ->
 2291:             false
 2292:     end.
 2293: 
 2294: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2295:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2296: 
 2297: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2298:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2299:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2300:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2301:     Client.
 2302: 
 2303: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2304:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2305:         undefined ->
 2306:             ok;
 2307:         Value ->
 2308:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2309:     end.
